PatientMatching.TEXT:
Record date: 2018-05-07
Spanish-speaking woman from Austria with severe dementia complains about abdominal pain after the gastric bypass surgery. She also has small bowel obstruction. Dr. Null recomends Vitamin D, multivitamins and aspirin. She likes whiskey on the rocks. She had a STEMI last week and HBA1C value was 7.2, creatinine was 2.3. Has used cocaine regularly after her left arm amputation. Currently taking plavix and metoprolol for her angina pectoris and ischemia.
